subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Anthony Atkinson scored 10 points in the final 39 seconds, including a layup at the buzzer, to give Barton College its first N.C.A.A. Division II title with a 77-75 victory against Winona State.
snippet: Anthony Atkinson scored 10 points in the final 39 seconds, including a layup at the buzzer, to give Barton College its first N.C.A.A. Division II title with a 77-75 victory against Winona State.
